name: Brain Drain (itch)
description:
Uploaded as promised.

Brain Drain is a little cute-em-up with four zones in a long single level.

Each zone ends with it's own boss.

Get hit once and die.

Quite unfair at times, and other times way too easy. Some Zany enemies to shoot.

Controls:

Enter to start.

Z to shoot

arrow keys to move

alt+enter to enter/exit fullscreen mode

Some changes have been made to this version from the original.

The removal of previous monikers held by myself, and release year.

your projectiles now spawn hit animations when they hit something.

I will return to this game later and make it a full, proper and hopefully good game, but under a different name and (I later learned another game had this name, and it was even a gameboy game, ironically) without the gameboy theme.
